com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer

Interface ApplicationContextConfigurer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotatedClassConfigurer, ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter, ComponentScanConfigurer, PostProcessorConfigurer, PropertyPlaceholderSupportConfigurer, PropertySourcesConfigurer, ProvidedBeansConfigurer, SingletonBeanConfigurer

    public interface ApplicationContextConfigurer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class[] annotatedClasses()
      Returns a set of annotated classes to register as components in the ApplicationContext.
      String[] componentScanPackages()
      Return a set of packages that should be scanned for additional components.
      default org.springframework.core.type.filter.TypeFilter[] excludedTypeFilters() 
      default boolean hasComponents()
      Checks if the configurer contains any actual components (beans) that would get created.
      default boolean isOptional()
      Checks if the configurer should be considered optional.
      static ApplicationContextConfigurer optional(@NonNull ApplicationContextConfigurer configurer)
      Makes a configurer optional.
      org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanFactoryPostProcessor[] postProcessors()
      Returns a set of BeanFactoryPostProcessor instances to apply to the ApplicationContext.
      org.springframework.core.env.PropertySources propertySources()
      Returns a PropertySources instance with configured property sources to make available.
      ProvidedBeansMap providedBeans()
      Returns a map of beans to register directly in the ApplicationContext.

    • Method Detail

      • providedBeans

        ProvidedBeansMap providedBeans()
        Returns a map of beans to register directly in the ApplicationContext. Provided beans will be registered first, before any of the annotated classes or defined packages are loaded.
        Returns:
        Map of bean name and value.
        See Also:
        ProvidedBeansMap

      • annotatedClasses

        Class[] annotatedClasses()
        Returns a set of annotated classes to register as components in the ApplicationContext. These can be annotated with @Configuration.
        Returns:
        Array of annotated classes.

      • componentScanPackages

        String[] componentScanPackages()
        Return a set of packages that should be scanned for additional components.
        Returns:
        Array of package names.

      • postProcessors

        org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanFactoryPostProcessor[] postProcessors()
        Returns a set of BeanFactoryPostProcessor instances to apply to the ApplicationContext.
        Returns:
        Array of post processor instances.

      • excludedTypeFilters

        default org.springframework.core.type.filter.TypeFilter[] excludedTypeFilters()
        Returns:
        set of excludedTypeFilters

      • propertySources

        org.springframework.core.env.PropertySources propertySources()
        Returns a PropertySources instance with configured property sources to make available.
        Returns:
        PropertySources instance or null.

      • hasComponents

        default boolean hasComponents()
        Checks if the configurer contains any actual components (beans) that would get created.
        Returns:
        true if any components need to be created

      • isOptional

        default boolean isOptional()
        Checks if the configurer should be considered optional. Optional configurers should not force a module to be loaded, they often provide infrastructure components that are only relevant if there are at least some other beans.
        Returns:
        true if this configuration should be considered optional

      • optional

        static ApplicationContextConfigurer optional(@NonNull
                                             @NonNull ApplicationContextConfigurer configurer)
        Makes a configurer optional.
        Parameters:
        configurer - to make optional
        Returns:
        new configurer
